Description: Fragment of black-glazed pottery bowl with incurved rim and ring foot; dip-glazed black on interior and exterior; underside reserved; incised inscriptions cut on wall and on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 538)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GS.115)
